    BDD.transform(BDD rel, BDDPairing pair)
    Shorthand for this.applyEx(rel, BDDFactory.and, vars).replace(pair), where vars is a varset BDD representation of the codomain of pair if pair maps variable V1 to V2, then LEVEL(V1) == LEVEL(V2)+1
